settings.title: How to Redeem
settings.description_col_1:
Redeem the full Hunt: Showdown game:

  • Launch the Steam client software and log into your Steam account.
  • Click the Games menu option at the top of the Steam client.
  • Choose Activate a Product on Steam...
  • Follow the onscreen instructions to complete the process.

Redeem the in-game Hunt: Showdown items:

  • Start the Hunt: Showdown game.
  • In the game lobby go to REDEEM CODE and redeem your code there to receive the Hunt: Showdown in-game items.
